title: Consumer spending on mobile games in the U.S. 2014 to 2016
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average expenditure in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 3 data points.
In general Average expenditure in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average expenditure in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Average expenditure in U.S. dollars, about 77.6 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Average expenditure in U.S. dollars about 60.95 was reached at Year 2014
